SEARCH
Package cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.infrastructure.files

Interface FileManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
FileManagerMyOwnFileFormat
public interface FileManager
This interface ensures that implementing classes can read and write application data to and from files.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ServiceContainer
    readDataFromFile(UserService userService)
    Reads data from a file and populates services within a service container.
    void
    saveDataToFile(ServiceContainer serviceContainer)
    Writes the current state of the application contained in a service container to a file.

  • Method Details

    • readDataFromFile

      ServiceContainer readDataFromFile(UserService userService) throws Exception
      Reads data from a file and populates services within a service container.
      Parameters:
      userService - The user service which may contain data necessary for initialization or validation.
      Returns:
      A fully populated ServiceContainer with the application's data loaded from a file.
      Throws:
      Exception - If any other exception occurs during the operation.

    • saveDataToFile

      void saveDataToFile(ServiceContainer serviceContainer) throws Exception
      Writes the current state of the application contained in a service container to a file.
      Parameters:
      serviceContainer - The service container holding all data to be saved.
      Throws:
      Exception - If any other exception occurs during the operation.
